title: Sampler, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk on cotton
Technique: cross, aztec (surface satin over withdrawn element work) and long armed cross stitch on plain weave foundation; counted stitches
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Gift from Jose Romero to Mrs. Fraser.
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Two separate pieces of cloth containing floral and geometric motifs and one alphabet joined together with decorative stitchery.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk on cotton
Technique: cross, aztec (surface satin over withdrawn element work) and long armed cross stitch on plain weave foundation; counted stitches. Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection. 1976-100-13.
